title: december 18: a is for avatar
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the making and release of one of the highest grossing films of all time, James Cameron’s Avatar. Afterwards, she talks about a band member leaving their group behind. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
